Names for war

Dear Sir, we listened to your news broadcasts + liked you so much when our little son was born we named him (Lowell Thomas) He is now two years of age. I am enclosing a picture�

Verso: Lowell Thomas 3 1/2 years

Master Lowell Thomas Fitzgerald, Age 5 tears, weight 62, 8 W 30th St. Latonia, Ky. He has had us read him many times the book you sent him 3 years ago. Kabluk of the Eskimi. Enjoys it very much [attached to 6.15 & 6.17]

Verso: Master Lowell Thomas Fitzgerald, Age 5 tears, weight 62, 8 W 30th St. Latonia, Ky. He has had us read him many times the book you sent him 3 years ago. Kabluk of the Eskimi. Enjoys it very much
Note: Christmas card from James, Jean and Tommie Fitzgerald [attached to photographs 6.15 & 6.16]
From Lowell Thomas Ftizgerald to Lowell Thomas [attaced to note 6.19]
Verso: From Lowell Thomas Ftizgerald to Lowell Thomas

Note: Just want to say hello to a grand man and show you how I look at 8 years, old. I am in the third grade. My sport is base ball and I also like to play army. Lowell Thomas Fitzgerald [attached to photography 6.18]
Photograph requests [includes autographed photograph of Lowell Thomas]
